metadata.description: A curated collection of development plugins for Claude Code with MCP servers and LSP support

plugins.name: basic-development-plugin
plugins.description: Essential development tools with MCP servers for docs lookup and LSP support for Go/TypeScript

plugins.name: nextjs-devtools-plugin
plugins.description: Complete Next.js development toolkit with devtools MCP, documentation lookup, code search, and TypeScript LSP

plugins.name: expo-devtools-plugin
plugins.description: Expo/React Native development toolkit with Expo MCP, documentation lookup, and TypeScript LSP

plugins.name: flutter-devtools-plugin
plugins.description: Flutter/Dart development toolkit with Dart MCP, code analysis, testing, and Dart LSP

plugins.name: cloudflare-workers-plugin
plugins.description: Cloudflare Workers development toolkit with managed MCP servers for deployment, debugging, and storage management
